ai-patthana15.7:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.7:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.7:2.1_0: For it is in order to go on the teaching that no happiness does not arise when a conditioned by bliss.
ai-patthana15.7:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.7:3.1_0: for the sake of equanimous equanimity, not cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.7:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
